comments: hey everyone, a little update: always hate feeling like i have excuses for every break, but this one was genuinely needed due to personal stuff that i had to sort out over the last 2 months. i know me saying that "THERE WILL BE MORE VIDEOS I SWEAR" can feel like an empty platitude given my track record, but i would like to tell you that there WILL be a 30-minute long video next week! (it is already nearly finished and i made sure of that before promising anything) thanks for sticking by me, and i hope you enjoy the chaos that i seem to always bring without meaning to :3
12:43pm and you uploaded. I'll just finish my gooning with your video then.
the game may be free to play, but every extraction game shooters have a hidden cost called your sanity

title: The True Extraction Shooter Experience
author: TuxBird
